channel.title: foss-north - the pod
channel.description: The foss-north conference crew discuss free and open source, meet interesting guests, and explores various topics around freedoms and source code.
channel.itunes:author: foss-north
channel.itunes:keywords: free software, open source, licensing, freedom

item.title: Compliance - part 1
item.description: The foss-north crew discuss and explain copyright and licenses. This is the first part of three about license compliance.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: The foss-north crew discuss and explain copyright and licenses. This is the first part of three about license compliance.
item.itunes:summary: The foss-north crew discuss and explain copyright and licenses. This is the first part of three about license compliance.

item.title: We have a pod
item.description: Announcing that we have a pod and what we will talk about during the autumn.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: Announcing that we have a pod and what we will talk about during the autumn.
item.itunes:summary: Announcing that we have a pod and what we will talk about during the autumn.

item.title: Choose a License
item.description: After having discussed about licenses, patents, communities and more we discuss how to choose a license. What to think about and how to reason.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: After having discussed about licenses, patents, communities and more we discuss how to choose a license. What to think about and how to reason.
item.itunes:summary: After having discussed about licenses, patents, communities and more we discuss how to choose a license. What to think about and how to reason.

item.title: The curl license - part 2
item.description: We continue our summer special with Daniel Stenberg, Mr Curl. We discuss patents, emacs, vim, rust, wolfssl and more.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: We continue our summer special with Daniel Stenberg, Mr Curl. We discuss patents, emacs, vim, rust, wolfssl and more.
item.itunes:summary: We continue our summer special with Daniel Stenberg, Mr Curl. We discuss patents, emacs, vim, rust, wolfssl and more.

item.title: The curl license - part 1
item.description: In our summer special Daniel Stenberg visits foss-north and talks about curl, the curl license, and how he picked a license for curl.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: In our summer special Daniel Stenberg visits foss-north and talks about curl, the curl license, and how he picked a license for curl.
item.itunes:summary: In our summer special Daniel Stenberg visits foss-north and talks about curl, the curl license, and how he picked a license for curl.

item.title: Open Projects
item.description: What is an open project? There is more beyond open source. We also discuss why open projects sometimes are less open. For instance when it comes to responsible disclosure and trademarks.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: What is an open project? There is more beyond open source. We also discuss why open projects sometimes are less open. For instance when it comes to responsible disclosure and trademarks.
item.itunes:summary: What is an open project? There is more beyond open source. We also discuss why open projects sometimes are less open. For instance when it comes to responsible disclosure and trademarks.

item.title: Patents - part 2
item.description: Mirko Boehm visits foss-north and talks about software patents (part 2).
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: Mirko Boehm visits foss-north and talks about software patents (part 2).
item.itunes:summary: Mirko Boehm visits foss-north and talks about software patents (part 2).

item.description: Mirko Boehm visits foss-north and talks about software patents (part 1).
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: Mirko Boehm visits foss-north and talks about software patents (part 1).
item.itunes:summary: Mirko Boehm visits foss-north and talks about software patents (part 1).

item.title: Tivoization
item.description: We take a look at tivoization. What is it, and why is it controversial?
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: We take a look at tivoization. What is it, and why is it controversial?
item.itunes:summary: We take a look at tivoization. What is it, and why is it controversial?

item.title: The GNU Licenses
item.description: We have a look at the GNU licenses. This episode discusses: GPL, LGPL, AGPL and GFDL.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: We have a look at the GNU licenses. This episode discusses: GPL, LGPL, AGPL and GFDL.
item.itunes:summary: We have a look at the GNU licenses. This episode discusses: GPL, LGPL, AGPL and GFDL.

item.title: Modern Permissive Licenses
item.description: We continue our tour of permissive licenses. This episode discusses: Apache License 2.0, MPL 2.0, various other permissive licenses such as WTFPL, Beerware, Unlicense, CC-0, zlib license.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: We continue our tour of permissive licenses. This episode discusses: Apache License 2.0, MPL 2.0, various other permissive licenses such as WTFPL, Beerware, Unlicense, CC-0, zlib license.
item.itunes:summary: We continue our tour of permissive licenses. This episode discusses: Apache License 2.0, MPL 2.0, various other permissive licenses such as WTFPL, Beerware, Unlicense, CC-0, zlib license.

item.title: Classic Permissive Licenses
item.description: We take a tour of the classic permissive licenses. This episode discusses: BSDs, MIT.
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: We take a tour of the classic permissive licenses. This episode discusses: BSDs, MIT.
item.itunes:summary: We take a tour of the classic permissive licenses. This episode discusses: BSDs, MIT.

item.description: What makes a software license a free and open source license?
item.itunes:author: foss-north
item.itunes:subtitle: What makes a software license a free and open source license?
item.itunes:summary: What makes a software license a free and open source license?

item.title: The History of Free and Open Source Software
item.description: We take a look at the history of free and open source software.

item.description: We look at how copyright affects software and why software licenses are necessary.

item.description: We have a look at the history of copyright and what it actually is.
